author: mandrenguyen
body:
This PR adds a vertex smearing for 2022 PbPb MC.
The 2022 PbPb relval is currently using pp beam settings for convenience.
Here we add a dedicated vertex smearing using the current pp beam centroid, which is the current best guess for the centroid in the PbPb run.  The width parameters (emittance & sigmaZ) are taken from 2018 PbPb, which should be quite close to what we get this year, and are quite a bit different from the pp defaults. 

This vertex smearing is not yet active in relval, as it needs the matching reco beamspot in the global tag.

@francescobrivio @tvami
title: Vertex smearing for 2022 PbPb based on pp centroid and 2018 PbPb width
